Pre-Game Insights: The T20 series between India and England that begins on Friday will see the return of pace bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar to international fold after well over a year.
India will bank on Bhuvneshwar Kumar's experience, especially in the absence of Jasprit Bumrah, who is sitting out of this series due to his marriage early next week.
India skipper Virat Kohli said that the right-arm pace bowler is shaping well and will be an important cog in India's wheel during the series.
Kohli added that Bhuvneshwar's experience and his ability to bowl in different phases of the match will come good and handy for the team.
